thread.title: Sacramento police fatally shoot unarmed black man 20 times

title: Sacramento police fatally shoot unarmed black man 20 times
text:
Sacramento police fatally shoot unarmed black man 20 times Friday, March 23, 2018 - 01:32 
Sacramento police released body camera footage on Wednesday night unveiling the fatal shooting of 22-year-old Stephon Clark in his backyard. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Sacramento police released body camera footage on Wednesday night unveiling the fatal shooting of 22-year-old Stephon Clark in his backyard. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2px0hOy
